article.content:
Common place to store supplemental graphics used for tutorials and quickies, such as Learn/Screencasts. May be numbered or named to be linked for a particular purpose (group of quickies, supplimental, etc.)

Other image types

  • Images (all)
  • Icons are generic images like calendars, arrow, "New!" balloons and so on.
  • Logos are for specific institutions, events or software.
  • Screenshots are for Galaxy screenshots used in this web site.
  • NewsGraphics are used in communications, such as Galaxy Development News Briefs. May have a date stamp.
  • Learn - Graphics are generally UI screenshots used in Support and Learn wikis.

PLACEHOLDER_ACTION(AttachFile, Attach a new file)

Screencast Frame
